title: The Cloudmaker
creator_credit: Leah Miller, Pieter Van Deusen and Churchill Films
brief_description: Animation, in which a tiny figure struggling in a gigantic electro-mechanical world challenges the viewer to think about how one can live, work and fit into, and find satisfaction in a large technological society. No commentary, music soundtrack only.
creator_credit_for_label: Leah Miller, Pieter Van Deusen and Churchill Films
